name: Earth, moles and robot
description:
Story...

The year is over 9000. Planet Earth is at war with mutated moles. They want to destroy the planet core and annihilate all humankind. The R.M.A - Robotic Moles Annihilator is Earth last hope... and it's ready to kill some moles!
